scripts.bump-dependencies: TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.shared.json node --loader ts-node/esm scripts/bump-dependencies.ts cpy-cli css-loader style-loader
scripts.fix: lerna run fix --parallel --stream && eslint --fix 'scripts/**/*.ts' && prettier --ignore-path lerna.json --loglevel error --write '*.json'
scripts.postinstall: simple-git-hooks && npm run patch-figma-plugin-typings && npm run build
scripts.publish: npm run build && lerna publish from-package
scripts.reset: npm run clean && lerna clean --yes && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.website-build: npm run website-clean && npm run website-build-docs && npm run website-build-storybook && cp packages/build/src/figma-plugin.json build/create-figma-plugin
scripts.website-build-docs: npm run generate-docs && lerna run build --scope website && cpy --cwd packages/website/build --parents '**/*' ../../../build

simple-git-hooks.pre-push: npm run lint && npm run fix && npm run test
